trans-unit.source: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: "주변 사람 찾기" 인프라가 있는 피어를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 인스턴스를 직접 만들 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A> method to return a collection of nearby peers.
trans-unit.target: 대신, "근처" 호출 피어 피어에 대 한 참조를 정적을 사용 하 여 가져온 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>가까운 동료의 컬렉션을 반환 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetPeersNearMe%2A>

trans-unit.source: A peer represented by a PeerNearMe object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.
trans-unit.target: PeerNearMe 개체가 나타내는 피어에에서 없는 경우 반드시 호출 피어 주소록

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새로운 기본 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 새 초기화 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 직렬화에 필요한 관련된 매개 변수를 사용 하 여 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 연관 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 와 연결 된 직렬화 대상은 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 생성 한 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> 에서 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체를 사용 하 여 연결의 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>와 연결 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create and associate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 만들고 연결 하는 공동 작업 인프라 못한는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> 와 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the associated descriptive parameters from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and associates it with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 생성 한 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> 관련된 설명 매개 변수를 사용는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체를 사용 하 여 연결의 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The display name assigned to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만든된 대화 상대에 할당 된 표시 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `nickname` to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: `nickname` 새로 만든된 연락처를 할당할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref> object that specifies the email address to assign to the newly created contact.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailAddress"></xref>새로 만든된 연락처를 지정할 전자 메일 주소를 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> containing descriptive parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>와 연결 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 설명 매개 변수를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Collaboration infrastructure has failed to create or update a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 공동 작업 인프라에서 만들기 또는 업데이트 하지는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> 와 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object from the provided <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 생성 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체에서 제공 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the provided <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> does not map to a signed-in peer on the same subnet, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 경우 제공 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>동일한 서브넷에 로그인 피어에 매핑되지 않는 `null` 반환 됩니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object that specifies the endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>피어와 연결 된 끝점을 지정 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>와 연결 된 개체는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The peerEndPoint is .
trans-unit.target: The peerEndPoint is .

trans-unit.source: The referenced <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*> specifies <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 참조 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>지정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체를 선택적으로 관리 되는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 로 설정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 와 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 비교는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 같은지 여부를 테스트할 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스 공급자에 데이터를 다른 일치 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The other argument is .
trans-unit.target: The other argument is .

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 비교는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스 지정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 같은지 여부를 테스트할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스 공급자에 데이터를 다른 일치 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 확인 여부를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스가 동일한 지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 을 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 제공 하는 인스턴스 데이터를 다른를 일치 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환 하는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식의 인스턴스를 비교 하는 데 사용 하는 정수 해시 코드는 부호 있는 32 비트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 정보를 표시 한 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 지정 된 직렬화 하는 데 필요한 데이터로 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 된 형식을 기본 형식을 호출 해야 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>메서드.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 데이터로 채울 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: serialization에 대 한 대상입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 관련 응용 프로그램, 개체 및 현재 상태 데이터를 검색 하는 네트워크 작업이 시작 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검색 되는 데이터 액세스 하 여 캐시에 저장 되는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>및 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>메서드도 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>속성.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InternalRefreshData method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: 호출자가 사용할 하기만 InternalRefreshData 메서드를 지정 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, 또는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 네트워크 작업이 완료 되 고 캐시를 업데이트할 때까지 추가 호출을 차단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: 호출자에 게 로그인 하는 데 필요 하지는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>메서드 또는 사용자 인터페이스를 통해이 작업을 성공적으로 완료할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the application, object, and presence data relevant to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 와 관련 된 응용 프로그램, 개체 및 현재 상태 데이터를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 원격 피어에 피어 공동 작업 응용 프로그램에 참여 하기 위한 초대를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>포함 된 관련 개체 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> 원격 피어가 지정 된 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: -<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 연관는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 에 지정 된는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> 은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 값 횟수는 연결 된 끝점을 '0' 또는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Guid> has not been associated with the current peer-to-peer application.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Guid>현재 피어 투 피어 응용 프로그램과 연결 되어 있지 않습니다.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to join a peer collaboration application to a remote peer that includes data that describes or specifies the application invite.
trans-unit.target: 피어 공동 작업 응용 프로그램 또는 응용 프로그램 초대 지정에 대해 설명 하는 데이터를 포함 하는 원격 피어에 참여 하기 위한 초대를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 가 나타내는 피어 공동 작업 관련 응용 프로그램을 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 초대와 함께 원격 피어에 보낼 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 메시지에는 최대 255 자의 유니코드 문자 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 초대와 연결할 데이터 blob를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K (16,384 bytes).
trans-unit.target: 크기는 16k (16384 바이트)로 제한 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the relevant <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"></xref> value specified by the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref>포함 된 관련 개체 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponseType"> </xref> 원격 피어가 지정 된 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: applicationToInvite 인수 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - The applicationToInvite argument specifies an empty .
trans-unit.target: - applicationToInvite 인수는 빈 . 지정

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> specified by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or has a value count of '0' associated endpoints.
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 연관는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 에 지정 된는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> 은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 값 횟수는 연결 된 끝점을 '0' 또는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding joining a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: 피어에서 초대 응답을 수신 피어 공동 작업 응용 프로그램 참여와 관련 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 정의 개체를 식별 하기 위해 비동기 작업의 콜백에 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: 이 필수 매개 변수는 모든 비동기 초대 진행 중인 작업에 대해 고유 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: userToken 인수 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object does not specify a valid <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 개체에 유효한 <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid> 를 지정 하지 않습니다

trans-unit.source: Receives an invitation response from a peer regarding an invitation to a peer collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: 피어 공동 작업 응용 프로그램에 초대에 대 한 피어 로부터 초대 응답을 수신 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the relevant Peer Collaboration application information represented by a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가 나타내는 관련 된 피어 공동 작업 응용 프로그램 정보를 지정 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 초대와 함께 원격 피어에 보낼 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 메시지에는 최대 255 자의 유니코드 문자 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: 사용자는 초대와 연결할 데이터 blob를 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Size is limited to 16K.
trans-unit.target: 크기는 16k로 제한 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 정의 개체를 식별 하기 위해 비동기 작업의 콜백에 전달 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations still in-progress.
trans-unit.target: 이 필수 매개 변수는 모든 비동기 초대 진행 중인 작업에 대해 고유 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The applicationToInvite argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: applicationToInvite 인수 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The userToken argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: userToken 인수 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - The endpoint specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> was not found.
trans-unit.target: -로 지정 된 끝점 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The applicationToInvite argument specifies an empty .
trans-unit.target: - applicationToInvite 인수는 빈 . 지정

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> representing the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.String>의 애칭을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If a contact is generated from a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> object, the associated contact Nickname is populated with this property value.
trans-unit.target: 연락처에서 생성 한 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>개체, 관련된 된 대화 상대의 애칭은이 속성 값으로 채워집니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents the Nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>애칭 나타내는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 신호는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 상속 된 클래스는이 설정을 재정의할 수 경우 메서드를 추가 작업은 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshDataCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 또한이 메서드를 사용 하면 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.source: Event data contained in a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 에 포함 된 이벤트 데이터는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.RefreshDataCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance is found, no longer available, or the associated <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object information has changed.
trans-unit.target: 새 때 신호를 받는 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스가 발견 되 면 더 이상 사용할 수 있는, 관련 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> 개체 정보를 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 관련 응용 프로그램, 개체 및 현재 상태 데이터를 검색 하는 네트워크 작업이 시작 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검색 되는 데이터 액세스 하 여 캐시에 저장 되는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>및 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>메서드도 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>속성.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: 호출자가 사용할 하기만이 메서드를 지정 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, 또는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 네트워크 작업이 완료 되 고 캐시가 업데이트 될 때까지 추가 호출을 차단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: 호출자에 게 로그인 하는 데 필요 하지는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>메서드 또는 사용자 인터페이스를 통해이 작업을 성공적으로 완료할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 개체가 삭제 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a network operation to retrieve the application, object and presence data specific to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 관련 응용 프로그램, 개체 및 현재 상태 데이터를 검색 하는 네트워크 작업이 시작 된 <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> methods as well as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검색 되는 데이터 액세스 하 여 캐시에 저장 되는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>및 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A>메서드도 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A>속성.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo.PresenceStatus%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetObjects%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.GetApplications%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A> method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>메서드만 호출자가 경우에 사용 하면 지정 된 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, 또는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.InternalRefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 네트워크 작업이 완료 되 고 캐시가 업데이트 될 때까지 추가 호출을 차단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to sign in with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
trans-unit.target: 호출자에 게 로그인 하는 데 필요 하지는 <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>메서드 또는 사용자 인터페이스를 통해이 작업을 성공적으로 완료할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-specified state object that is passed to the delegate when this method completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 작업을 완료 하는 경우 대리자에 전달 되는 사용자 지정 상태 개체입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이전 RefreshDataAsync 호출 아직 완료 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.target: serialization에 대 한 대상입니다.
